instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no video
threads.message:
I`ve got this macbook air with water damage didn`t turn on no green light nothing.
I put it in ultrasonic cleaner.
After ultrasonic cleaner I have green light on the charger fan is spining but no chime and no video. 
What do I have to test next?
Total newbie here, go easy on me

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no video
threads.message: Where was corrosion???? Could be corrodes resistors or traces on SPI lines.......
